definition[0]: happening or done quickly and immediately
example[0]: My letter received a swift reply.
example[1]: She shot a swift glance at Paul.
example[2]: They were swift to deny the accusations.
definition[1]: moving, or able to move, very fast
example[4]: She wiped her tears away in one swift movement.
definition[2]: a small brown bird that has pointed wings, flies very fast, and is similar to a swallow
definition[3]: Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications; an electronic system that allows banks all over the world to send information and payments to each other
